Description: Mint 2016 ES-335. Lived it's life in a case. Played twice in my home, stored in my humidity controlled music room. Comes with COA, original sales receipt from American Musical Supply when I purchased in 2016. Warranty was registered with Gibson at time of receipt. Burstbucker pickups. This faded lightburst finish shows the grain nicely and the cream bindings have a nice vintage color. This is both a looker and a tone monster. With factory case and will ship in original Gibson box. $50 flat shipping for CONUS 48 via Fedex Ground. Please, no offers. Specs from Gibson: The ES-335 has been a legendary tone machine since 1958. Gibson’s 2016 model features a tubeless Historic truss rod, PAF-style Burstbucker 1 and 2 pickups, and redesigned neck shape for increased strength and enhanced playing comfort.
